input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 2''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree 7.5''
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Snow Flocked Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International Pre-lit 7.5' Hillside Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Lights'
  - Name='2-Pieces 5 ft. Monochrome Pine and Cypress Topiary Artificial Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Unlit Green Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='7Ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 1000 Tips Alcott Hill'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Georgian Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 6.5-ft. Buffalo Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with LED String Lights'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 2-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and Battery-Operated LED'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 6' Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Etta Avenue White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact same product line with no modifiers in name; essentially identical product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Snow Flocked Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree but snow flocked and likely differing branch design and construction; less similar in look and structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6-Feet Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree with LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar in height and pre-lit with LED lights, but different brand and unknown branch construction; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Pre-lit 7.5' Hillside Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit spruce tree similar in height, but fewer lights and different species silhouette; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 2-Pieces 5 ft. Monochrome Pine and Cypress Topiary Artificial Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Topiary style trees not a traditional full Christmas tree silhouette; low relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Unlit Green Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit artificial spruce tree similar in type but no lights and possibly different branch construction; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 6ft Tall Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and type, likely full artificial Christmas tree but brand and details differ; moderately high relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 7Ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 1000 Tips Alcott Hill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit spruce tree with many branch tips and realistic branches, similar silhouette but unlit; quite relevant aside from lacking lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 7ft Unlit Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to other unlit spruce trees; same category but lacks pre-lit feature and likely different branch structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Twillery Co. Peabody Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir tree, same general species silhouette likely full bodied with good branch tips; probably close in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Georgian Fraser Fir Artificial Unlit Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another fir tree, unlit version, slightly less relevant due to absence of lights but similar type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end artificial tree similar in quality but different species (spruce vs fir); reasonably relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow spruce tree differs in silhouette and fullness, less similar in form than fuller fir trunk.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Redwood silhouette very different from fir Christmas tree shape; low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 6.5-ft. Buffalo Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree with LED String Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height fir tree with LED lights, though slim profile reduces similarity to full-bodied Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Exact product line with specified size and pre-lit feature matching reference closely, identical product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 9 Ft. Foxtail Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree species (foxtail pine) and taller height but similar pre-lit artificial tree category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 2-ft. Heritage Pine Artificial Tree with Burlap Base and Battery-Operated LED
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very short decorative pine tree with battery LEDs, not comparable in size or likely fullness/construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fir tree unlit, differs in fullness and lighting features from full pre-lit Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 6' Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: 6 ft fir tree same height as reference; relevance moderate due to unknown lighting and branch details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Etta Avenue White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: White spruce likely different coloration and species; less relevant to green full-bodied Dunhill Fir.
